评论详情: After having my 2nd child, my body hasn't bounced back like it once did so while planning to go back to the gym I realized none of my previous clothes fit.  I came across this brand and am so highly pleased. This shirt comes in multiple colors, it's oversized as described and is breathable. Good quality material. True to size! If you want the shirt more oversized I would size up.  The shirt is not wrinkle resistant as you can see in the picture, is stretchy, and in my opinion flattering. Run to go buy! You won't be disappointed.  Will be buying more colors.

The shirt is comfortable, a good weight fabric - not too think or too heavy. Good length overall and fit the sleeves, neck is a great fit. It does run a bit small Sonic order one size up if you don’t want it to cling to your body.

I bought one back in May that was nice and thick. Wear it to the gym at least once a week. I bought a new one and it’s thin. Not the same material at all which is disappointing. But I guess it’s what you get for $10.
True to size. Very soft and comfy
I thought the fabric and the quality are very nice. i would buy again.

The shirt is so soft and the material is great!! I would imagine it would be wonder for the gym but the neckline hole is so small and tight I could barely put my head in and it wrapped tightly around my neck. I prefer a looser fit around the neck.

I recently purchased the beige colored one and I am shocked at how much I love this shirt. It is beyond comfortable. It is true to size, soft, stretchy, thick but not heavy. It doesn’t feel like I am wearing a shirt. Shipping and packaging was quick and nice! I am anxiously waiting for my next paycheck to buy more of them! I highly recommend these.
I didn't look were it was coming from. Because the sizing was way off I order both 3X and it may fit someone from China but not me. I will pay more attention when ordering next time.
I love the quality of the shirts however the colors are showed to be more washed out and they’re actually very bright and dark.
itchy and too small
I absolutely love! Stretchy! Soft! Fits as aspected and does not clingy.
It is comfortable and color is great really like it and it washes well thank you.

Comfy shirt and plenty roomy. I highly recommend.

I’m 150lb. 5ft 8. Medium chest size. I bought these to workout in. I was needing some more relaxed/baggy fit shirts. I’m 3 months postpartum. I ordered a large after seeing people’s reviews to size up because they were not oversized enough when purchased at normal size. I received them and tried them on. They fit me like they would my husbands XL tshirts (I sleep in) so way too big. I was going to keep one to wash it but it’s only 30% cotton so won’t shrink much. I do like the three colors I got. I will be reordering them in a medium. Sad that they are now not on sale and out of some of the original colors I ordered. They seemed soft. Excited to workout in them.

Not durable and not worth it. I would gladly pay $100 for a quality cotton T-shirt but can’t find those on here, just junk fashion. This shirt has pilling all over it now, even with careful washing and drying this is what it looks like just 4 short months later.
